name: Sloth Air Baloon
description:
Get set to take off on an epic adventure as the Sloth takes to skies in Air Baloon.
Whilst enjoying the monkey and his love suddenly find their world has been turned upside down when an evil Sloth character swoops onto the scene and flees with the fair Sloth
Featuring an endless and randomly generated Scene collect as many baloons as possible in order to obtain the high score
